text: Urumandampalayam Rayappa Gounder Krishnan (born April 1, 1944) is an Indian politician from the All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam Party. == Early life == Krishnan was born on May 18, 1944 to Urumandampalayam Rayappa Gounder. ==Career== He served as a member of the Rajya Sabha from July 25, 1977 to July 24, 1983. == References == * Category:1944 births Category:Living people
title: U. R. Krishnan
